column1: Thorondor was sent by Manwë to watch over the Noldor after they arrived in Beleriand. The Eldar first encountered him when he helped Fingon rescue Maedhros from imprisonment from Thangorodrim.

column2: Thorondor and the rest of the Eagles settled in the Crissaegrim. When Gondolin was built
column3: Thorondor became the ever vigilant guardian of the city. He rescued Fingolfins body from defilement after Morgoth killed him
